question:
\(\boxed{x}\)is defined as the least integer greater than x for all odd values of x, and the greatest integer less than x for all even values of x. What is the value of \(\boxed{-2}-\boxed{5}\)?
(A) –12
(B) –9
(C) –8
(D) –7
(E) 3
